body:
I Have a problem on when i join any game on Avicus Network And i keep getting hit when i spawn its so annoying it started yesterday like i get hit and the emery is not even there and i teleport back to that block i was standing on can someone please reply on whats join on thanks :D
                     -DarkArcher810

title: Whats Wrong With ME!!!

replies.body: Ever heard of a run-on sentence?
replies.body_tagged: Ever heard of a run-on sentence?

replies.body: oh ok thanks guys for the answers ur best
replies.body_tagged: oh ok thanks guys for the answers ur best

replies.body: Server isn't encountering lag. It's on your end unfortunately, DarkArcher810. It's unlikely that it is AntiCheat as we've toned it down so that it does not interfere with gameplay. If it does, then again, it's likely a poor ping or connection to the server on your end.
replies.body_tagged: Server isn't encountering lag. It's on your end unfortunately, DarkArcher810. It's unlikely that it is AntiCheat as we've toned it down so that it does not interfere with gameplay. If it does, then again, it's likely a poor ping or connection to the server on your end.

replies.body: Yesterday the server crashed 4 times within 2 hours and there was serious pause lag. I'm finding that the lag is coming from the server, not me...
replies.body_tagged: Yesterday the server crashed 4 times within 2 hours and there was serious pause lag. I'm finding that the lag is coming from the server, not me...

reply_to.body: Server isn't encountering lag. It's on your end unfortunately, DarkArcher810. It's unlikely that it is AntiCheat as we've toned it down so that it does not interfere with gameplay. If it does, then again, it's likely a poor ping or connection to the server on your end.

replies.body: Must have a bad ping. I've never had lag since Avicore came out, just fps lag.

replies.body: Yea i figured it out that i was laggy when i restarted my internet it was fixed thanks for info guys
